goals.complete: I surveyed the new island from a high point and spotted Kralkatorrik's wing. While Taimi sent a chopper to collect blood from it, I went looking for her research assistant to pick up Gorrik's seismic instruments.

goals.active: Collect seismic data to map the island.
goals.complete: I placed three seismic taps around the island to collect data for Gorrik, who hopes to map the interior. At the last location I found wild ley energyâ€”magic that Kralkatorrik can eat to heal! Taimi also reported that the chopper went down due to signal interference from the wing. Then Caithe chimed in: Aurene had found something.
